recommended_actions.description: Monitor cost trend — last 20 avg rose from $1.94 (A#146) to $2.36 (A#149), a 22% increase over 3 audit cycles. B sessions averaging $2.73 and R sessions $2.91. High-cost sessions are justified individually but the aggregate trend warrants monitoring. If next audit shows continued rise above $2.50 avg, consider session complexity caps.
recommended_actions.action: Monitor next audit. If last-20 avg exceeds $2.50 or any type avg exceeds $3.50, create structural cost control recommendation.
